name: ConstrainDOMStringParameters
description: The ConstrainDOMString dictionary is used to specify a constraint for a property whose value is a string. It allows you to specify one or more exact string values from which one must be the parameter's value, or a set of ideal values which should be used if possible. You can also specify a single string (or an array of strings) which the user agent will do its best to match once all more stringent constraints have been applied.
